laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple dural-based enhancing lesions of the skull base compressing the optic nerves and brainstem, believed to be most consistent with multiple meningiomas.
Demonstrated resolution of the enhancing lesions.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, there was interval progression of enhancing lesions especially in the posterior fossa, but prednisone administration resulted in complete resolution of symptoms.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Marked resolution of the patient's multiple skull base lesions.
Slight progression of the tuberculum sella lesion and definite progression into the posterior fossa.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval progression noted in posterior fossa enhancing lesions.
